recipes.label: Hint: A Rousing Performance: Not Enough!
recipes.startdescription: There is something here, but I cannot quite reach it. If I could stage a performance with a stronger tie to Edge.

recipes.label: Perform a Show laced with the Intent of Edge
recipes.startdescription: The audience is my army, their muscles clenched with summoned passion.
Now comes the time for me to channel this energy into whatever target I desire.

slots.label: Direction
slots.description: Now that my Intent is set, I have to set my Direction. What do I wish to affect?

recipes.label: The Concord of Queens
recipes.startdescription:
A knight he marches on he marches on
Through the lands he marches on...

recipes.label: The Concord of Queens
recipes.startdescription:
The stone queen speaks
She speaks the words of Duty
Of the ties that bind
And the lines that divide
And of those borders which never should be crossed at all.

But the knight he marches on, he marches on
To his doom he marches on

recipes.label: The Concord of Queens
recipes.startdescription:
As the wild queen sings
She sings the whimper of desire
Of the whims on wings of whimsy
To be cherished and discarded
But which now hurt more than they should

As the knight he marches on, he marches on
For his love he marches on

recipes.label: The Concord of Queens
recipes.startdescription:
As the red queen speaks
She speaks of demands of true devotion
Of her aspirations for their future
And sacrifices now required,
An accord that must be made

So the pine knight marches on he marches on
To a knotted noose he marches on
